# predict.beauty — Beauty & Cosmetics Prediction Markets

> Real-time prediction markets for beauty & cosmetics. Bet on outcomes, see live odds, and win. Free to play with shared pools powered by Firebase.


predict.beauty is a prediction market platform focused on beauty & cosmetics. Users can bet YES or NO on curated markets with real-time shared pools. Features live odds, countdown timers, trending markets, and social sharing. Part of the Predict Network — 18 niche prediction market sites.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Beauty & Cosmetics prediction markets with live odds](https://predict.beauty)
- [Markets — Active beauty & cosmetics prediction markets](https://predict.beauty#markets)


## Keywords

prediction market, beauty & cosmetics, betting, odds, forecast, predict.beauty
